Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Quality Hotel Rouge et Noir Roma in Rome (Tiburtina EST), you'll be close to Mausoleo di Santa Costanza and Diocletian Bath. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Piazza Bologna and Luiss University of Rome.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 207 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Quality Hotel Rouge et Noir Roma in Rome (Tiburtina EST), you'll be close to Mausoleo di Santa Costanza and Diocletian Bath. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Piazza Bologna and Luiss University of Rome.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mausoleo di Santa Costanza - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Piazza Bologna - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Luiss University of Rome - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Villa Torlonia - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Catacombe di Priscilla - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Academy of Fine Arts - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Umberto I Policlinic of Rome - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
University of Roma-La Sapienza - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
National Central Library of Rome - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Villa Ada - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Porta Pia - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Museum of Contemporary Art of Rome - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Piazza Fiume - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Diocletian Bath - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Octagonal Hall - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 14.5 km / 9 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 28.1 km / 17.5 mi

The preferred airport for Quality Hotel Rouge et Noir Roma is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 28.1 km / 17.5 mi

The preferred airport for Quality Hotel Rouge et Noir Roma is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
